title: Isekai Kara Kita Elf To Tomo Ni Sugosu Nichijou
alternative_title: Daily Life With an Elf From Another World; Isekai Kara Kita Kimi (Elf) to Tomo ni Sugosu Nichijou; 異世界から来た君（エルフ）と共に過ごす日常
status: Daily Life With an Elf From Another World; Isekai Kara Kita Kimi (Elf) to Tomo ni Sugosu Nichijou; 異世界から来た君（エルフ）と共に過ごす日常
description:
Description :
        "I'm going to start living with an elf!"Oribe Eiichi, a young man without a job and at the bottom of his life, picks up a mysterious stone in the park one day. When he opens his eyes, he finds himself on top of a giant tree with a beautiful elf in his arms! Eichi tries to save her, but she falls from the tree and loses consciousness.When he wakes up in the hospital a short time later, he finds Kurokawa and the elf Tia, who claims to be a public security officer.There, he is told a shocking truth...
